biotools.summary: Fast Forward-Backward Gibbs sampler for Bayesian inference on Hidden Markov Models (HMM). It uses the Haar wavelet transform to dynamically compress the data based on the current variance sample in each iteration.

bioschemas.name: HaMMLET
bioschemas.summary: Fast Forward-Backward Gibbs sampler for Bayesian inference on Hidden Markov Models (HMM). It uses the Haar wavelet transform to dynamically compress the data based on the current variance sample in each iteration.
